  TM2 Dinobot, there's proof. Megatron used schematics and DNA from t=
he original Dinobot to build a new one, therefor making the original versio=
n of the Beast Wars semi-orgainc.

  This and a comment that Optimus made i=
n Beast Machines about bringing organics back to cybertron and thier bodies=
 were just the beginning.
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: Jon H=
ogan

 AM

    (OOC:)

    True they may have lu=
ngs....but does that mean they're organic? 
    Consider medical technology=
. When our lungs fail can we not get 
    artifical lungs built or be put o=
n a machine that mimics the effect 
    of "breathing". So yes maybe they n=
eed to breathe but still there's 
    no proof either for or against, to be=
 honest, that the beast forms 
    use organic bits.

    Anyways in the lo=
ng run I don't think it really matters eh? :)
